snippet: If the sheer number of baby pinks and chalky blues on the fall runways was any indication, pastels will be making a big statement this fall.
lead_paragraph: If the sheer number of baby pinks and chalky blues on the fall runways was any indication, pastels will be making a big statement this fall.
